title: Android 13 Beta 1 hands-on: top new functions and features [Video]
content:
After a series of developer-facing early previews, the public-facing Android 13 Beta 1 update is now available to a small pool of eligible Google Pixel handsets.

description: We've ranked all of the best new features that have been added to Google Pixel devices as part of the public-facing Android 13 Beta 1.
